title: PREFACE.

book.title: The Turning of the Tide
book.description: 简介： A distinguished professor of Mathematics in a New England college was wont to remark to the Freshman class when meeting them for the first time at recitation, that every person is as lazy as he can be. However we may demur to this sweeping assertion,...
